column1: In an earlier version of the [[legendarium]] '''Arlisgion''' or the '''Place of Reeds''' were names for the fenland region later known as '''[[Lisgardh]]'''.

column2: The Fall of Gondolin]]'' it is described as being located to the south of [[Dor-lómin
column3: Dor Lómin]] but separated from it by the [[Iron Mountains]]. [[Tuor]] stayed there for a while before departing for the "yet more lovely" [[Nan-tathren
